      • persist

        public static File persist(IncrementalIndex index,
           org.joda.time.Interval dataInterval,
           File outDir)
                    throws IOException
        This is *not* thread-safe and havok will ensue if this is called and writes are still occurring on the IncrementalIndex object.
        Parameters:
        index - the IncrementalIndex to persist
        dataInterval - the Interval that the data represents
        outDir - the directory to persist the data to
        Returns:
        the index output directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs persisting the index
